name: VIHTALI S.r.l.
goal: VIHTALI is a spin-off company founded by Catholic University in Italy providing services to support the evidence based analysis with the aim of promoting innovation in the Health care sector. VIHTALI is developing studies and research to create competences in the new processes and technology evaluation in the health sector through the exchange of experiences and practical applications at national and international level.
interests: Digital economy and society, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
EXPERT PANEL ON EFFECTIVE WAYS OF INVESTING IN HEALTH through the participation of Prof. alter Ricciardi

Opinion on
Defining value in “value-based healthcare”
